title: All the Gems or Crystals that other champions have should have special taunt or something for Taric
body:
It's kind a interesting that some champions have gems/crystals on them mostly SUPPORT Champions. Taric should have special bonus AP/AD/MS/Armor/MR or special taunt on those Champions that have Gem/crystals on them for the new REWORK.
<3 Taric and big fan of ALL SUPPORT CHAMPS
